section.p: You can leave possessions and money here to save having to carry them around with you. Write in the box anything you are leaving here. Each time you return, :

outcomes.outcome: A thief; all the money you left here has gone

A fire; your town house and all its contents have been
destroyed

section.p: You can also rest at your town house for as long as you wish. If injured, restore your Stamina to its normal unwounded score. When you’ve finished at your town house, (and remember to erase the tick in the town house box there if it was destroyed by fire).
